LanguageData.DeepGravload_CommandManageToggleDesc: Mark this storage as managed by the gravship. Colonists will not use or modify its contents until the toggle is switched off.
LanguageData.DeepGravload_StorageLockedDesc: This storage is currently managed by the gravship.
LanguageData.DeepGravload_StorageLockedReason: Disable gravload management to edit these storage settings.
